title: 59 Best Gifts for Women (and Everyone Else in Your Life)
description: Skip the gift cards and get them something they’ll actually love
author: Shoko Wanger
excerpt: Forget the gift cards this year and get them something they’ll love. Read on for our favorite gifts for women.
text: Let’s face it: There’s really no end to gift-giving season. Throughout the year, there are many occasions for which we’re called to dream up the perfect gifts for women in our lives from Mother’s Day and Valentine’s Day to Hanukkah, Christmas, and birthdays. So routine is the search for the next great gift that it’s easy to lose sight of what truly sets a present apart: that it reflects thought and care about the person who receives it. No matter who you’re shopping for or how elusive your loved one’s wish lists may be, we’ve compiled a list of gift ideas designed to minimize the guesswork. From home decor to high-tech gadgets, skincare gift sets to culinary staples, it’s varied enough to suit a wide range of interests and styles, but selective enough to be special—so you can stop the search (finally!), and just get to celebrating.Shop our top gifts for women:The Cozy Gift: Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw, $140 from QuinceThe Perfect Robe: Boll & Branch Dream Robe, $149 from Boll & BranchThe Glassware Gift: Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set, $100 from SSENSEFor the Plant Parent: Sutton 15 Self Watering Pot, $35 from EtsyThe Fragrance: Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum, $225 at NordstromThe Bauble: Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings, $138 from MejuriFor the Skin-Care Devotee: Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift Set, $23 from AmazonShop by section:Home and kitchen giftsBeauty & wellness giftsAccessories & apparel giftsHome and kitchenQuince Ribbed Knit Cashmere ThrowNo home decor gift guide would be complete without a blanket. Lounging just got a little more luxe thanks to this mid-weight knit number, made from grade-A Mongolian cashmere for unbeatable softness and winter-ready warmth.Christina Lundsteen Stripe Bolster PillowCovered in candy-colored stripes, this cotton velvet bolster is childlike joy in textile form. Choose from three shade combinations, including raspberry paired with a soft blush pink akin to rose gold.Cozy Earth Boucle Throw BlanketAnother reason to argue that blankets are among the best gifts (or at least the most foolproof): They seamlessly double as decor. This one is all about texture, showcasing a lightweight alpaca, wool, and silk blend, with tasseled trim for added interest.Subtle Art Studios Classic Checkered Glass Tile TrayThe perfect gift for any tchotchke collector: a handcrafted glass tray in an assortment of playful colors, from California-based Subtle Art Studios. (We also love the brand’s matching coasters and incense holders.)Baba Tree Pakurigo BasketAs any decor enthusiast knows, you can never have too many baskets. This one, handwoven in Ghana using elephant grass, boasts an extra-special silhouette that makes it a work of art in its own right."Woman Made: Great Women Designers" by Jane HallThis coffee table compendium spotlights over 200 inspiring women in design, from Anni Albers to Ray Eames, Ana Kraš to Florence Knoll.Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte with Flower LidYou cannot go wrong with Le Creuset cookware. This flower-adorned mini cocotte is a real treat for home cooks, who can use it to make single-serving portions of favorite dishes like soups, desserts, and breakfast bakes.Bellahera Stained Glass Hanging Pothos PlantSome people just can’t keep houseplants alive—and that’s okay, especially when there are stained glass substitutes like this to make up for a lack of (living) greenery. This is the gift for the women who has everything, except for a green thumb.Bearaby Organic Cotton NapperIf you’re struggling to figure out what to give a loved one who’s had a tough year, consider the coziest present of all: a weighted blanket that feels like a hug.Bearaby Snuggler Heated BottleOr consider the brand’s aptly named Snuggler, a microwavable weighted bottle designed to alleviate tension and soothe nagging aches, pains, and cramps.Bang & Olufsen Wireless Waterproof Bluetooth SpeakerA gadget that looks good enough to keep on display? This wireless waterproof speaker allows audiophiles a seamless listening experience no matter where they go—from sunbathing in the backyard to belting out tunes in the bath.Sutton 15 Self Watering PotThe base of this attractive ceramic planter contains a self-watering system that makes it a can’t-miss choice, even for the gardening novices among us."Capri Dolce Vita" by Cesare CunacciaInspire never-ending wanderlust in your favorite traveler with photos and stories centered around a beyond-special island in the Mediterranean.Matouk Cairo Scallop TowelsA pair of Matouk hand towels personalized with her initials will instantly give her bathroom a luxury spa-feel.Avocado Vase by Ed Spurr and Amy Hall BrownOne part vase and another part planter, this glass vessel was designed to cradle an avocado pit as it sprouts, making a delightfully unique gift for aspiring green thumbs or anyone who enjoys a low-stakes kitchen experiment. (Whatever your giftee’s level of gardening experience, instructions are included.)Flamingo Estate Night Blooming Jasmine & Damask Rose XL CandleTreat a collector of scented candles to the gift of an extra-long burn. This 26-ounce, triple-wicked beauty from Flamingo Estate—perfumed with jasmine, rose, bergamot, and orange blossom—is estimated to last up to 165 hours. (If candles aren’t her thing, consider these bricklike soaps, in the same intoxicating scent.)Pottery Barn Square Quartz CatchallBring elegance to an entryway (or bedside table, or bathroom sink) with this luxe quartz catchall, generously sized to keep an array of essentials in reach.Buffy Puffer BlanketThis quilted puffer blanket from Buffy is stain-resistant, machine-washable, available in five colors, and suitable for all seasons.Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets SetAny drink is made more festive with a Maison Balzac hand-blown tumbler. This giftable duo features tantalizing glass citrus slices affixed to their bases.Gohar World Sea Creatures Mother-of-Pearl Spoons (Set of 4)File these mother-of-pearl spoons under “necessary indulgences.” Shaped like sea creatures and perfectly sized for caviar, they’re luxurious, chic, and just the right amount of cheeky.Sophie Lou Jacobsen + Etagere Spiral Nickel-Plated Coasters (Set of 8)An instant classic, these spiral coasters from Sophie Lou Jacobsen will add shine to any tablescape.CB2 Kalman Polished Stainless Steel Cocktail ShakerGift your partner-in-crime this vintage-inspired, stainless steel cocktail shaker—a bar cart staple that’s both minimalist and unmistakably bold.Our Place Night + Day CarafeLeave it to the team behind the Always Pan—a multifunctional bestseller—to create a glass carafe that seemingly does it all. Not only does it come with a filtering lid, cold brew infuser, and wine aerator, it’s available in a selection of elegant colors, making it easy on the eyes to boot.Bormioli Rocco Italian Crinkle GlassesThese curvy, Italian-made glasses are downright delightful, bringing eye-popping flair and dishwasher-safe durability to the table.East Fork Glass Colorblock Serving Spoon SetA collaboration between East Fork and Florida glass studio DOT, these marbled glass spoons serve up thoughtful design with a side of fun.AREAWARE Everything Nice Bowls (Set of 2)While these attractive glass bowls are intended for sugar and salt, she can fill them with just about any spice she reaches for most.Graza “The Duo” Extra Virgin Olive Oil SetThese single-origin olive oils check all the boxes: high-quality, delicious, affordable, and packaged in cute squeezable bottles to boot.Dry RoséAn elevated take on fridge-friendly boxed wines, Juliet’s eco-friendly containers feature a rope handle, built-in spout, and hold the equivalent of two full bottles.Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter KitThe perfect gift for any matcha addict: a countertop machine grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a freshly brewed cup in just one click.Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee MakerThis design-forward stovetop coffee maker takes its name—which translates from Italian to “chick”—from the beak-like shape of its anti-drip spout.Alessi Blue MGSAL Salt Castor by Michael GravesMade of thermoplastic resin and high-shine stainless steel, this 1980s Alessi staple is sure to please culinary aesthetes looking to add color and clever design to their kitchen toolkits.Great Jones x Fellow KettleThe Stagg EKG Electric Kettle makes a perfect gift for any pour-over coffee fanatic—especially in this limited-edition colorway, courtesy of a collaboration with Great Jones.Beauty & wellnessPillow by Christina Lundsteen & Anthropologie, Robe by Quince, PJs by Eberjey, Blankets by Quince and Cozy Earth, Eye Mask by Brooklinen, Travel Pouch by Quince, Hand Cream by Le Labo, Catchall by Pottery Barn, Fragrance by Byredo, Necklace by Monica Vinader, Earrings by Mejuri Photography by Lizzie Soufleris, Styled by Adrian AbabovićByredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de ParfumAn homage to the influence of African culture on 1920s Paris, this unisex floral scent, with notes of African marigold, bergamot, violet, and Moroccan cedar, is a surefire choice for fragrance lovers (not to mention travelers, history buffs, and romantics too).Quince 100% Washable Silk Beauty Sleep SetA must-have on any long-haul flight, this sleep set—which includes a silk eye mask, two scrunchies, and a pillowcase—makes a great gift for frequent travelers (and each piece is machine washable, too).The Citizenry Aegean Cotton Bath Towel SetTurn a simple shower into an act of self-care with cotton-linen bath towels that bundle beauty, breathability, and sustainable manufacturing into one very pretty package. (We see you, eyelash fringe.)Boll & Branch Dream RobeWith four-layer organic cotton construction, luxuriously deep pockets, and a roomy, unisex cut, Boll & Branch’s cozy Dream Robe delivers on the promise of its name.Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand BalmSometimes the gift of self-care comes in a chic tube of moisturizing hand cream. All of Aesop’s scents are heavenly, but this balm will wiggle its way right into their regular skin care routine.Kinto Insulated Travel TumblerAn essential addition to any wellness toolkit, this double-walled stainless steel water bottle comes in a range of rich shades and keeps drinks hot or cold for up to six hours.Innisfree Hydration Heroes SetThis ultra-hydrating skincare gift set includes a full, four-step routine powered by the healing benefits of green tea.Dyson Supersonic Hair DryerIf you’re looking to go all out with our favorite gifts for women, why not gift the gold standard of hair dryers? The TikTok-beloved Dyson Supersonic is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage and frizz while leaving locks extra smooth and shiny.Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift SetThink of this Laneige box set as three small gifts in one. With two lip treatments and a sleeping mask for the skin, the trio promises to hydrate, boost, and brighten from the comfort of bed.Dermalogica Discover Healthy Skin Complete Regimen KitDermalogica’s kit has everything you need to start your skin-care journey—including a double cleansing system, exfoliator, and hydrating moisturizer for balanced skin.Le Labo Hinoki Hand PomadeThis plant-based pomade combines skincare heavy hitters—shea butter, coconut oil, and almond oil—with a woodsy scent inspired by Japanese Buddhist temples.Accessories & ApparelKhaite Simona Shoulder BagThis Khaite showstopper, with python-embossed leather, double straps, and soft suede lining, makes a thoughtful gift for the woman who can’t resist an eye-catching handbag.Toteme Leather Gloves’Tis the season for layering! Gloves make great holiday gifts, and this pair from Toteme is especially plush, featuring soft Nappa leather and a cozy wool-and-cashmere interior.Quince Italian Leather Pouch Travel SetThe jetsetter in your life will be thrilled to pop this two-piece travel gift set into their tote, gym backpack, or weekender. Handmade from 100% Italian leather, it’s miles above a messy Ziploc doubling as a makeup bag—and its interior is lined in microfiber, which means any spills that do happen can be swiftly wiped away.Quince Large Organic Freshwater Cultured Pearl HoopsThese handcrafted hoops offer a whimsical take on a classic silhouette. (Pair with this minimalist diamond bangle if you’re aiming to impress.)Monica Vinader Siren Gemstone Mini NecklaceThis quietly luxurious pendant necklace sets a vibrant emerald against a graceful gold chain—a pairing sure to appeal to jewelry devotees both daring and demure.Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link EarringsChic mixed-metal earrings, featuring 18k gold vermeil and sterling silver, is a worthy addition to any fashion-forward jewelry box.Catbird Tiniest Alphabet StudThose in search of personalized gifts—or ideas to commemorate meaningful life events, or a memorable birthday gift—would do well to consider Catbird’s recycled gold alphabet studs, which can be mixed and matched, worn in singles or as pairs.Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ SetThink beyond leggings and oversized sweatshirts. Not only are Eberjey’s silk pajamas chic, they’re machine washable, hypoallergenic, and biodegradable too.LUCKY Wishful Pig Pendant in Solid GoldThe good luck charm she didn’t know she needed: A tiny golden pig festooned with a trio of twinkling stars.Kara Yoo Margot Bow Pearl EarringsSweet and sophisticated, this collaborative design from Kara Yoo and Catbird pairs freshwater cultured pearls with sterling silver findings.Jade and White Topaz Nap EarringsOutfitted with poke-free backs, Maison Miru’s nap earrings were designed with comfort in mind. Available in a variety of styles— including this jade-and-white-topaz combo—each pair is made from medical grade titanium, and safe for sensitive skin.Quince 100% Washable Silk Pajama Long Sleeve TopSoft, sleek, and machine washable, this silk pajama top is an example of loungewear gone luxe.Sophie Buhai Fan Shell Hair ClipThe epitome of understated glamor, Sophie Buhai’s tortoiseshell hair clip is a splurge she may not make for herself—but will likely reach for on the daily.Loewe Puffer Goya Leather AirPods CaseGift a safe and stylish place to stash her trusty Apple AirPods with this padded leather case, filled with 100% down and finished with a clever magnetic closure.Bottega Veneta Cassette Intrecciato Leather CardholderFor a Bottega-obsessed best friend, this strappy cardholder showcases the brand’s beloved woven leather look in miniature, in a can’t-miss hue that’s a cinch to spot in a crowded handbag.Yves Saint Laurent Glam Cat Eye SunglassesVintage glamour will never go out of style. Help her channel her inner Italian movie star with perennially chic cat-eye shades.
html:
Let’s face it: There’s really no end to gift-giving season. Throughout the year, there are many occasions for which we’re called to dream up the perfect gifts for women in our lives from Mother’s Day and Valentine’s Day to Hanukkah, Christmas, and birthdays. So routine is the search for the next great gift that it’s easy to lose sight of what truly sets a present apart: that it reflects thought and care about the person who receives it. No matter who you’re shopping for or how elusive your loved one’s wish lists may be, we’ve compiled a list of gift ideas designed to minimize the guesswork. From home decor to high-tech gadgets, skincare gift sets to culinary staples, it’s varied enough to suit a wide range of interests and styles, but selective enough to be special—so you can stop the search (finally!), and just get to celebrating.

Shop our top gifts for women:

  • The Cozy Gift: Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw, $140 from Quince
  • The Perfect Robe: Boll & Branch Dream Robe, $149 from Boll & Branch
  • The Glassware Gift: Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set, $100 from SSENSE
  • For the Plant Parent: Sutton 15 Self Watering Pot, $35 from Etsy
  • The Fragrance: Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum, $225 at Nordstrom
  • The Bauble: Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings, $138 from Mejuri
  • For the Skin-Care Devotee: Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift Set, $23 from Amazon

Shop by section:

  • Home and kitchen gifts
  • Beauty & wellness gifts
  • Accessories & apparel gifts

Home and kitchen

Quince Ribbed Knit Cashmere Throw

No home decor gift guide would be complete without a blanket. Lounging just got a little more luxe thanks to this mid-weight knit number, made from grade-A Mongolian cashmere for unbeatable softness and winter-ready warmth.

Christina Lundsteen Stripe Bolster Pillow

Covered in candy-colored stripes, this cotton velvet bolster is childlike joy in textile form. Choose from three shade combinations, including raspberry paired with a soft blush pink akin to rose gold.

Cozy Earth Boucle Throw Blanket

Another reason to argue that blankets are among the best gifts (or at least the most foolproof): They seamlessly double as decor. This one is all about texture, showcasing a lightweight alpaca, wool, and silk blend, with tasseled trim for added interest.

Subtle Art Studios Classic Checkered Glass Tile Tray

The perfect gift for any tchotchke collector: a handcrafted glass tray in an assortment of playful colors, from California-based Subtle Art Studios. (We also love the brand’s matching coasters and incense holders.)

Baba Tree Pakurigo Basket

As any decor enthusiast knows, you can never have too many baskets. This one, handwoven in Ghana using elephant grass, boasts an extra-special silhouette that makes it a work of art in its own right.

"Woman Made: Great Women Designers" by Jane Hall

This coffee table compendium spotlights over 200 inspiring women in design, from Anni Albers to Ray Eames, Ana Kraš to Florence Knoll.

Le Creuset Stoneware Mini Round Cocotte with Flower Lid

You cannot go wrong with Le Creuset cookware. This flower-adorned mini cocotte is a real treat for home cooks, who can use it to make single-serving portions of favorite dishes like soups, desserts, and breakfast bakes.

Bellahera Stained Glass Hanging Pothos Plant

Some people just can’t keep houseplants alive—and that’s okay, especially when there are stained glass substitutes like this to make up for a lack of (living) greenery. This is the gift for the women who has everything, except for a green thumb.

Bearaby Organic Cotton Napper

If you’re struggling to figure out what to give a loved one who’s had a tough year, consider the coziest present of all: a weighted blanket that feels like a hug.

Bearaby Snuggler Heated Bottle

Or consider the brand’s aptly named Snuggler, a microwavable weighted bottle designed to alleviate tension and soothe nagging aches, pains, and cramps.

Bang & Olufsen Wireless Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker

A gadget that looks good enough to keep on display? This wireless waterproof speaker allows audiophiles a seamless listening experience no matter where they go—from sunbathing in the backyard to belting out tunes in the bath.

Sutton 15 Self Watering Pot

The base of this attractive ceramic planter contains a self-watering system that makes it a can’t-miss choice, even for the gardening novices among us.

"Capri Dolce Vita" by Cesare Cunaccia

Inspire never-ending wanderlust in your favorite traveler with photos and stories centered around a beyond-special island in the Mediterranean.

Matouk Cairo Scallop Towels

A pair of Matouk hand towels personalized with her initials will instantly give her bathroom a luxury spa-feel.

Avocado Vase by Ed Spurr and Amy Hall Brown

One part vase and another part planter, this glass vessel was designed to cradle an avocado pit as it sprouts, making a delightfully unique gift for aspiring green thumbs or anyone who enjoys a low-stakes kitchen experiment. (Whatever your giftee’s level of gardening experience, instructions are included.)

Flamingo Estate Night Blooming Jasmine & Damask Rose XL Candle

Treat a collector of scented candles to the gift of an extra-long burn. This 26-ounce, triple-wicked beauty from Flamingo Estate—perfumed with jasmine, rose, bergamot, and orange blossom—is estimated to last up to 165 hours. (If candles aren’t her thing, consider these bricklike soaps, in the same intoxicating scent.)

Pottery Barn Square Quartz Catchall

Bring elegance to an entryway (or bedside table, or bathroom sink) with this luxe quartz catchall, generously sized to keep an array of essentials in reach.

Buffy Puffer Blanket

This quilted puffer blanket from Buffy is stain-resistant, machine-washable, available in five colors, and suitable for all seasons.

Maison Balzac Orange Apéritif Gobelets Set

Any drink is made more festive with a Maison Balzac hand-blown tumbler. This giftable duo features tantalizing glass citrus slices affixed to their bases.

Gohar World Sea Creatures Mother-of-Pearl Spoons (Set of 4)

File these mother-of-pearl spoons under “necessary indulgences.” Shaped like sea creatures and perfectly sized for caviar, they’re luxurious, chic, and just the right amount of cheeky.

Sophie Lou Jacobsen + Etagere Spiral Nickel-Plated Coasters (Set of 8)

An instant classic, these spiral coasters from Sophie Lou Jacobsen will add shine to any tablescape.

CB2 Kalman Polished Stainless Steel Cocktail Shaker

Gift your partner-in-crime this vintage-inspired, stainless steel cocktail shaker—a bar cart staple that’s both minimalist and unmistakably bold.

Our Place Night + Day Carafe

Leave it to the team behind the Always Pan—a multifunctional bestseller—to create a glass carafe that seemingly does it all. Not only does it come with a filtering lid, cold brew infuser, and wine aerator, it’s available in a selection of elegant colors, making it easy on the eyes to boot.

Bormioli Rocco Italian Crinkle Glasses

These curvy, Italian-made glasses are downright delightful, bringing eye-popping flair and dishwasher-safe durability to the table.

East Fork Glass Colorblock Serving Spoon Set

A collaboration between East Fork and Florida glass studio DOT, these marbled glass spoons serve up thoughtful design with a side of fun.

AREAWARE Everything Nice Bowls (Set of 2)

While these attractive glass bowls are intended for sugar and salt, she can fill them with just about any spice she reaches for most.

Graza “The Duo” Extra Virgin Olive Oil Set

These single-origin olive oils check all the boxes: high-quality, delicious, affordable, and packaged in cute squeezable bottles to boot.

Dry Rosé

An elevated take on fridge-friendly boxed wines, Juliet’s eco-friendly containers feature a rope handle, built-in spout, and hold the equivalent of two full bottles.

Cuzen Matcha Maker Starter Kit

The perfect gift for any matcha addict: a countertop machine grinds tea leaves into powder and whisks up a freshly brewed cup in just one click.

Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee Maker

This design-forward stovetop coffee maker takes its name—which translates from Italian to “chick”—from the beak-like shape of its anti-drip spout.

Alessi Blue MGSAL Salt Castor by Michael Graves

Made of thermoplastic resin and high-shine stainless steel, this 1980s Alessi staple is sure to please culinary aesthetes looking to add color and clever design to their kitchen toolkits.

Great Jones x Fellow Kettle

The Stagg EKG Electric Kettle makes a perfect gift for any pour-over coffee fanatic—especially in this limited-edition colorway, courtesy of a collaboration with Great Jones.

Beauty & wellness

Byredo Bal d’Afrique Eau de Parfum

An homage to the influence of African culture on 1920s Paris, this unisex floral scent, with notes of African marigold, bergamot, violet, and Moroccan cedar, is a surefire choice for fragrance lovers (not to mention travelers, history buffs, and romantics too).

Quince 100% Washable Silk Beauty Sleep Set

A must-have on any long-haul flight, this sleep set—which includes a silk eye mask, two scrunchies, and a pillowcase—makes a great gift for frequent travelers (and each piece is machine washable, too).

The Citizenry Aegean Cotton Bath Towel Set

Turn a simple shower into an act of self-care with cotton-linen bath towels that bundle beauty, breathability, and sustainable manufacturing into one very pretty package. (We see you, eyelash fringe.)

Boll & Branch Dream Robe

With four-layer organic cotton construction, luxuriously deep pockets, and a roomy, unisex cut, Boll & Branch’s cozy Dream Robe delivers on the promise of its name.

Aesop Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm

Sometimes the gift of self-care comes in a chic tube of moisturizing hand cream. All of Aesop’s scents are heavenly, but this balm will wiggle its way right into their regular skin care routine.

Kinto Insulated Travel Tumbler

An essential addition to any wellness toolkit, this double-walled stainless steel water bottle comes in a range of rich shades and keeps drinks hot or cold for up to six hours.

Innisfree Hydration Heroes Set

This ultra-hydrating skincare gift set includes a full, four-step routine powered by the healing benefits of green tea.

Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer

If you’re looking to go all out with our favorite gifts for women, why not gift the gold standard of hair dryers? The TikTok-beloved Dyson Supersonic is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage and frizz while leaving locks extra smooth and shiny.

Laneige Dream Team Trio Gift Set

Think of this Laneige box set as three small gifts in one. With two lip treatments and a sleeping mask for the skin, the trio promises to hydrate, boost, and brighten from the comfort of bed.

Dermalogica Discover Healthy Skin Complete Regimen Kit

Dermalogica’s kit has everything you need to start your skin-care journey—including a double cleansing system, exfoliator, and hydrating moisturizer for balanced skin.

Le Labo Hinoki Hand Pomade

This plant-based pomade combines skincare heavy hitters—shea butter, coconut oil, and almond oil—with a woodsy scent inspired by Japanese Buddhist temples.

Accessories & Apparel

Khaite Simona Shoulder Bag

This Khaite showstopper, with python-embossed leather, double straps, and soft suede lining, makes a thoughtful gift for the woman who can’t resist an eye-catching handbag.

Toteme Leather Gloves

’Tis the season for layering! Gloves make great holiday gifts, and this pair from Toteme is especially plush, featuring soft Nappa leather and a cozy wool-and-cashmere interior.

Quince Italian Leather Pouch Travel Set

The jetsetter in your life will be thrilled to pop this two-piece travel gift set into their tote, gym backpack, or weekender. Handmade from 100% Italian leather, it’s miles above a messy Ziploc doubling as a makeup bag—and its interior is lined in microfiber, which means any spills that do happen can be swiftly wiped away.

Quince Large Organic Freshwater Cultured Pearl Hoops

These handcrafted hoops offer a whimsical take on a classic silhouette. (Pair with this minimalist diamond bangle if you’re aiming to impress.)

Monica Vinader Siren Gemstone Mini Necklace

This quietly luxurious pendant necklace sets a vibrant emerald against a graceful gold chain—a pairing sure to appeal to jewelry devotees both daring and demure.

Mejuri Mixed Metal Handcrafted Convertible Link Earrings

Chic mixed-metal earrings, featuring 18k gold vermeil and sterling silver, is a worthy addition to any fashion-forward jewelry box.

Catbird Tiniest Alphabet Stud

Those in search of personalized gifts—or ideas to commemorate meaningful life events, or a memorable birthday gift—would do well to consider Catbird’s recycled gold alphabet studs, which can be mixed and matched, worn in singles or as pairs.

Eberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ Set

Think beyond leggings and oversized sweatshirts. Not only are Eberjey’s silk pajamas chic, they’re machine washable, hypoallergenic, and biodegradable too.

LUCKY Wishful Pig Pendant in Solid Gold

The good luck charm she didn’t know she needed: A tiny golden pig festooned with a trio of twinkling stars.

Kara Yoo Margot Bow Pearl Earrings

Sweet and sophisticated, this collaborative design from Kara Yoo and Catbird pairs freshwater cultured pearls with sterling silver findings.

Jade and White Topaz Nap Earrings

Outfitted with poke-free backs, Maison Miru’s nap earrings were designed with comfort in mind. Available in a variety of styles— including this jade-and-white-topaz combo—each pair is made from medical grade titanium, and safe for sensitive skin.

Quince 100% Washable Silk Pajama Long Sleeve Top

Soft, sleek, and machine washable, this silk pajama top is an example of loungewear gone luxe.

Sophie Buhai Fan Shell Hair Clip

The epitome of understated glamor, Sophie Buhai’s tortoiseshell hair clip is a splurge she may not make for herself—but will likely reach for on the daily.

Loewe Puffer Goya Leather AirPods Case

Gift a safe and stylish place to stash her trusty Apple AirPods with this padded leather case, filled with 100% down and finished with a clever magnetic closure.

Bottega Veneta Cassette Intrecciato Leather Cardholder

For a Bottega-obsessed best friend, this strappy cardholder showcases the brand’s beloved woven leather look in miniature, in a can’t-miss hue that’s a cinch to spot in a crowded handbag.

Yves Saint Laurent Glam Cat Eye Sunglasses

Vintage glamour will never go out of style. Help her channel her inner Italian movie star with perennially chic cat-eye shades.
